name: @camunda8/sap-btp-integration
description: mono repo for the Camunda BTP Integration, part of the SAP Integration

scripts.//_start:approuter: intended for local dev; the INCOMING_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT env var is set at deploy-time in mta.yaml
scripts._start:approuter: cross-env INCOMING_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT=900000 npm run start:local -w router
scripts.//_start:app: intended for local dev - this also starts the CAP layer!
scripts._start:app: npm run -w core _deploy:sqlite; npm run start:local -w fiori-app
